ptxt.intxrefpoff: Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Removal and Installation:N32A

item.ptxt: Check that O-ring (1) is free from damage.
Check that end face of sensor and signal plate tooth are free from any metal particles and damage.

s1.ptxt: If faulty condition is found, replace CKP sensor.

s2.ptxt: Connect three new 1.5 V batteries in series and check that total voltage is 4.5 – 5.0 V.
Connect batteries (1) and ohmmeter (3) to CKP sensor as shown in figure.
Check that CKP sensor resistance varies as specified below by passing magnetic substance (iron) (2).

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to keep approximately 1 mm (0.03 in) gap “a” between magnetic substance (iron) and respect to end face of CKP sensor.

spec.title: CKP sensor resistance
spec.ptxt: Resistance varies between less than 20 Ω and infinity
